frontmatter.description: The best effots helps others grow.
frontmatter.title: Devote time to efforts that enable growth

frontmatter.description: Declare objective & importance, allot time accordingly

frontmatter.description: Acknowledge common desires work backwards towards understanding actions
frontmatter.title: Acknowledge common desires work backwards towards understanding actions

frontmatter.description: Excitement and joy shouldn't be put on hold due to outside, uncontrollable factors. Experience greatly depends on expecations, attitudes, and approaches.
frontmatter.title: Approach activities with excitement

frontmatter.description: Self-reliance doesn't necessarily mean doing everything on your own. It's infeasible to be an expert in everything and making that a requirement will imppose limits.
frontmatter.title: Self-reliance & proactive problem solving

frontmatter.description: Something good comes from all experiences. Not looking for *everything* to be good because that's not true or realistic.
frontmatter.title: Something good comes from all experiences

frontmatter.description: Trust in the future to find joy in the present. The future is steadily, continually approaching regardless of our actions.
frontmatter.title: Trust in the future to find joy in the present

frontmatter.description: Find opportunities for encouragement. It's hard to continue doing things without any feedback and positivity. Find ways to encourage growth and look for ways to receive it.
frontmatter.title: Find opportunities for encouragement

frontmatter.description: my time on the sons of Sam horn forums taught me a lot about stats. We can all work to develop skills that increase our value over the replacement. Find ways to push specialized skills (SS defense) while maintaining high output general skills (power hitting).
frontmatter.title: Develop skills that increase VORP

frontmatter.description: Seek to influence others by letting them see what you see, rather than dictating outcomes via ultimate control.
frontmatter.title: Work towards common goals thru influence
